_id.title: Identifier
_id.description: A unique identifier for the record.

accountPersonID.title: Account Person ID
accountPersonID.description: Unique ID for this relationship between an account and a person.

accountID.title: Account ID
accountID.description: Unique ID for the account in this account person relationship.

personID.title: Person ID
personID.description: Unique ID for the person in this account person relationship.

personRole.title: Person Role
personRole.description: Role of the person on this account.

isDirect.title: Direct Flag
isDirect.description: Boolean to indicate if this is a direct relationship between the account and the person.

isActive.title: Active Flag
isActive.description: Boolean to indicate if this relationship between the account and the person is active.

isPrimary.title: Primary Flag
isPrimary.description: Boolean to indicate if the person is the primary contact on the account.

relationStartDate.title: Relationship Start Date
relationStartDate.description: The date when the relationship between the account and the person started.

relationEndDate.title: Relationship End Date
relationEndDate.description: The date when the relationship between the account and the person ended.

currencyCode.title: Currency Code
currencyCode.description: The ISO 4217 currency code used for the relationship between the account and the person.
